an5.255:1.1: “Pancannam, bhikkhave, macchariyanam pahanaya samucchedaya brahmacariyam vussati.
an5.255:1.4: kulamacchariyassa … labhamacchariyassa … vannamacchariyassa … dhammamacchariyassa pahanaya samucchedaya brahmacariyam vussati.
an5.255:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam macchariyanam pahanaya samucchedaya brahmacariyam vussati”ti.
